subject: Marriages
Tennis
Wimbledon Tennis Tournament
lead_paragraph: Martin Emmrich and Michaella Krajicek, German-Dutch mixed doubles partners, met at a pre-Wimbledon grass-court tournament in 2013; 12 months later, at the same event, Emmrich summoned up the courage to propose to Krajicek on court.
snippet: Martin Emmrich and Michaella Krajicek, German-Dutch mixed doubles partners, met at a pre-Wimbledon grass-court tournament in 2013; 12 months later, at the same event, Emmrich summoned up the courage to propose to Krajicek on court.
